attributes.action: Resolve the Brexit Crisis with a Grand Bargain for a Common Future
attributes.additional_details:
The UK is in crisis. What has got us to this point is politics, what we need to resolve it is leadership.

We, the common people of the UK, see that what we have right now is politicians. What we want for are leaders.

We call on all members of HMG, MPs, Scottish Gov, Welsh Assembly, NI Assembly, and political parties to help strike a GRAND BARGAIN for a COMMON FUTURE.

Stop fighting about who will lead and start leading. That is why we vote for you.
attributes.background:
We call for an immediate 10 Year deal for Britain:
1 Create 6 million decent jobs in the green economy outside of London
2 A citizen salary of £100 per week for all UK tax residents
3 Keep our place in the EU
4 No more Project Fear. Clearly set out the rights and obligations of the UK nations

rejection.details: We're not really sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. In any case, we can only accept petitions which call on the UK Government and Parliament to take action. We can't accept petitions calling for action from elected and unelected members of other Parliaments, Assemblies or parties.
